price: 是常住的乐园，至仁主本未见而应许其众仆的，他的诺言确是要履行的。
arabic: جَنَّٰتِ عَدۡنٍ ٱلَّتِي وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ عِبَادَهُۥ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ وَعۡدُهُۥ مَأۡتِيّٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: jannāti ʿadnin allatī waʿada al-raḥmānu ʿibādahu bil-ghaybi innahu kāna waʿduhu matiyyan
